item.description:
The Beaver Brook Association has agreed to do their Full Moon Hike/Snowshoe as a special event for us tonight.

The plan will be to join Beaver Brook staff on this near full moon night guided walk on Beaver Brook's beautiful trails. They will conclude our night hike with warm cocoa and cookies back in the warmth of Maple Hill Farm. Cost is $10 payable to Beaver Brook Association (Includes use of snowshoes - conditions permitting) The program will last approx. 2 hours.

You must call Beaver Brook Association at 603-465-7787 (weekdays from 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.) to register and pre-pay to secure your spot. Please note in your RSVP that you have paid.

Note - Beaver Brook is doing this event on Friday Feb 22nd also and it is open to the general public. Be sure to sign up for the right day!

See: www.beaverbrook.org for directions.

Cancellation Policy: If event is cancelled due to bad weather/ bad driving/horrible conditions, Beaver Brook will refund completely or offer people the opportunity to get in the next scheduled class/event. No refunds for no-shows.


~~ Note ~~ This event is not truely full until you see 14 "Paid" RSVPs on the right hand side. Feel free to give Beaver Brook a call to see if there are spots available.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Barn at Maple Hill Farm
item.name: Full Moon Hike @ Beaver Brook
